clusters.name: JavaScript Scope & Closures
clusters.description: Essential JavaScript core concepts covering how variables are accessed and retained, forming the basis for advanced functional programming patterns.

items.reason: Understanding the different types of scope (lexical, global, function, block) is fundamental for grasping how JavaScript manages variable access and forms the necessary prerequisite for understanding closures.

Closures build directly upon the concept of lexical scope. Learning about closures after mastering scope allows for a deeper understanding of function factories, private variables, and maintaining state in functional programming.
